title.narrative: Greater Mekong and Subregion (GMS) Kunming-Haiphong Transport Corridor - Noi Bai-Lao Cai Highway Project

description.narrative: The Project is designed to provide (i) a 244-kilometer grade-separated and access-controlled highway, including 10 interchanges with toll booths and five service areas, starting at Noi Bai in a suburb of Hanoi and ending at Lao Cai, on the border with the People's Republic of China (PRC) in northwest Viet Nam; (ii) electric, communications, and tolling systems and associated facilities, and the Vietnam Expressway Corporation's (VEC's) highway operation and maintenance (O&M) equipment and vehicles; and (iii) capacity building for VEC on management of project implementation, corporate financing management, O&M of highways, and safeguard planning and implementation.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: International and local traffic use an efficient, safe, and reliable express route from Noi Bai to Lao Cai on the border with PRC

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

Annual average daily traffic volume increased
Baseline (2008): 20,000-25,000 for Noi Bai-Viet Tri section; 6,000-12,000 for Viet Tri-Yen Bai section; and 3,500 for the Yen Bai-Lao Cai section

description.narrative: International and local traffic use an efficient, safe, and reliable express route from Noi Bai to Lao Cai on the border with PRC

title.narrative:
Average travel time between Noi Bai and Lao Cai reduced
Baseline (2008): 8 hours for passenger cars, 9 hours for buses, and 12 hours for trucks

description.narrative: International and local traffic use an efficient, safe, and reliable express route from Noi Bai to Lao Cai on the border with PRC

title.narrative:
Motality index (Number of fatalities per billion traffic volume-kilometers) reduced by 60%
Baseline (2008): 18 fatalities for Noi Bai-Viet Tri section; 6 fatalities for Viet Tri-Yen Bai section; and 6 fatalities for the Yen Bai-Lao Cai section

description.narrative: International and local traffic use an efficient, safe, and reliable express route from Noi Bai to Lao Cai on the border with PRC

title.narrative:
Number of long-distance buses on the highway in a day increased by 50%
Baseline (2009): 49 buses from Ha Noi, to Yen Bai, 31 buses from Ha Noi to Lao Cai 0 buses from Ha Noi to Kunming

description.narrative: International and local traffic use an efficient, safe, and reliable express route from Noi Bai to Lao Cai on the border with PRC
